Description: Saudi Arabian Cooperative Insurance (known as: SAICO) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since September 2007. SAICO operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has company operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Property and Casualty Insurance. SAICO is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in August 2007.
